column1: Smoque BBQ////When it comes to a corner BBQ
column2: well outside of downtown and in the true neighborhoods of Chi-Town - this place is as real as it gets. Being from Michigan
column3: a BYOB spot like this in Chi Town is a real delight. You wouldn't believe the looks I got when me and my crew showed up here with full top shelf rack of bottles (Grey Goose
column6: etc.) and boy did we forget about the liquor when we got the food. I got the 1/2 Slab STL ribs and 1/2 Slab Baby Back Ribs combo for about $20. BOY DID IT HIT THE SPOT. The meat was just plain divine - tender
column8: fell right off the bones - drenched in sauces made in the heavens.
